sources.title: Suzanna1922Excerpts
sources.description: Excerpts from "SUZANNA" (1922) -- Mabel Normand SUZANNA (approx. 3/4ths of the film is known to survive) Mack Sennett-Allied Producers and Distributors,  7940 ft., rel: Dec 24, 1922 dir. F. Richard Jones, auth. Linton Wells cast:  Mabel Normand (Suzanna), George Nichols (Don Fernando), Walter McGrail (Francisco), Winifred Bryson (Chiquita), Leon Barry (Pancho), Minnie Devereaux (Minniehaha) , Eric Mayne (Don Diego), Evelyn Sherman (Francisco’s mother), Black Hawk, Lon Pott (Miguel’s father), George Cooper (Miquel), Carl Stockdale (Ruiz), Aline Manning Location: Camulos Ranch (just outside of Fillmore, CA); San Luis Rey River, CA, copyright:  Jan. 4, 1923 NOTE. "Suzanna" was in production before and after the death of William Desmond Taylor; with the Taylor murder itself taking place during a break in filming. William Thomas Sherman, wts@gunjones.com, William Thomas Sherman, wts@gunjones.com, http://www.angelfire.com/mn/hp/ Although at present and due to some technical problem the Internet Archive video player is not working for this video, the download file is still good and plays normally.
